alert.note: Alert for Clark; Dallas; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 5:16PM CDT until April 15 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Ouachita County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 516 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chidester, or 16 miles northwest of Camden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sparkman... Chidester... Whelen Springs... White Oak Lake State Park... Poison Springs State Park... Amy... Ouachita... Holly Springs... Reader... Vaden... Tates Bluff... Pine Grove... Bragg City... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Little Rock.
